mapper.sql: log_id, page_id, page_url, op_type, op_desc, ip, sid, create_date
mapper.select: select * from tb_rs_oprate_log,tb_rs_user_info where tb_rs_user_info.sid in (select sid from tb_rs_user_info where net_sid = #{netSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and tb_rs_user_info.sid = tb_rs_oprate_log.sid;
mapper.insert: insert into tb_rs_oprate_log (log_id, page_id, page_url, op_type, op_desc, ip, sid, create_date) values (#{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{opDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_rs_oprate_log
log_id,
page_id,

op_desc,
ip,
sid,
create_date,

mapper.update:
update tb_rs_oprate_log
page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_url = #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_type = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
op_desc = #{opDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_rs_oprate_log set page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_url = #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_type = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, op_desc = #{opDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
